summary: So this is my first mod, its pretty simple.  She is a Nord race, with Daedric Armor and shield, Dawnbreaker Sword, and Flame of Atronach scroll.  Bella is located upstairs in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun!  Standalone Mod! Nothing else reqd'  Please feel free to comment, rate, or give advice.
descriptionHtml: So this is my first mod, its pretty simple.  She is a Nord race, with Daedric Armor and shield, Dawnbreaker Sword, and Flame of Atronach scroll.  Bella is located upstairs in the Bannered Mare in Whiterun!  Standalone Mod! Nothing else reqd'  Please feel free to comment, rate, or give advice.
